document.topic_text: Bethlehem Catholic's 'Wonderful Town' fantastic BECAHI Presents "Wonderful Town" HARRY FISHER / The Morning Call Elek Zamolyi (left) and Madelyn Dundon perform during a dress rehearsal of Bethlehem Catholic High School's 'Wonderful Town' earlier in April. Elek Zamolyi (left) and Madelyn Dundon perform during a dress rehearsal of Bethlehem Catholic High School's 'Wonderful Town' earlier in April. (HARRY FISHER / The Morning Call) Bethlehem Catholic's 'Wonderful Town' was wonderful Kudos to all the high school musicals in the area. These kids give their heart and soul to create magnificent entertainment. I attended Bethlehem Catholic's musical, "Wonderful Town." It was fantastic! These kids put forth a terrific effort to put on a show that meets Broadway standards. The singing was amazing. The Freddy awards are a wonderful way to evoke talent that normally would not have been brought to light. Rose Ann Posch
